Sir, binary search samjhiye step-by-step!

ðŸŽ¯ Simple Definition:
Binary search ek smart technique hai jo sorted array mein element dhundti hai by dividing search space in half.

ðŸ“š Real-World Analogy:
Dictionary mein word dhundna - aap middle page khol ke dekh te hain, phir decide karte hain left ya right jaana hai!

ðŸ”¢ Live Example:
Array: [1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11, 13]
Target: 7

Step 1: Middle = 7 (index 3) â†’ Found it! âœ…
Agar 5 dhundte: Middle = 7 â†’ "Too high" â†’ Left half mein dhundo

ðŸ’» Working Code:
```python
def binary_search(arr, target):
    left, right = 0, len(arr) - 1
    
    while left <= right:
        mid = (left + right) // 2
        
        if arr[mid] == target:
            return mid  # Mil gaya!
        elif arr[mid] < target:
            left = mid + 1  # Right side dhundo
        else:
            right = mid - 1  # Left side dhundo
    
    return -1  # Nahi mila
```

ðŸŒ Real Applications:
Google search, phone contacts, library systems, database queries!

â“ Quick Question:
Agar 1000 elements hain, maximum kitne comparisons lagenge? (Hint: logâ‚‚(1000) â‰ˆ 10)

Sir, recursion ka matlab kya hai?

ðŸŽ¯ Definition: Recursion ek tarah ka algorithm hai jismein ek function apne aap ko call karta hai, lekin phir woh function apne aap ko dobara call karne se pehle, apne aap ko solve karta hai.

ðŸ“š Real Example: Ek bachcha apne maa ko khaana khilane ke liye bolta hai. Maa bachche ko bolta hai ki woh aapke bade bhai se puchhe, aur woh bade bhai bhi maa se bolta hai, lekin jab woh maa se puchhta hai to maa kahte hain ki woh apne dadaji se puchhe. Is tarah se bachcha apne dadaji se puchhta hai. Yeh recursion ka ek aisa example hai.

ðŸ”¢ How it works: Recursion ka process nimnalikhit hai:
- Ek function apne aap ko call karta hai.
- Function apne aap ko solve karta hai, aur phir apne aap ko call karta hai.
- Is process ko repeat karte rahe, jab tak koi condition nahi purn hoti hai.
- Jab condition purn hoti hai, to function apne aap ko stop karta hai aur result return karta hai.

ðŸŒ Applications: Recursion ka upyog Fibonacci series, binary search, array traversal, tree traversal aur graph traversal jaise kai algorithms mein kiya jata hai.
Sir, general ke baare mein cloud service unavailable hai. Local response use kar raha hun.
Kya hai Sir? Aap kaisay hain aaj? Need kuch bhi karna hai to bataiye, main yahaan aapki sahayta karne ke liye hai.
Arre sir, main samjhaunga.

**Definition:** General aisa hota hai jiska kaam sabhi cheezon ko samjhne ka hota hai. Wah ek aisa adhikari hota hai jo saare rules, regulation aur policies ko samjhne ke liye zaroori hota hai.

**Real Example:** Ek school ke principal ka kaam hota hai ki wah sabhi rules aur regulationon ko samjhne ke liye zaroori hota hai, jaise ki school ke samay, uniform, homework, aur sabhi.

**How it works:** General ke kaam mein yeh steps shamil hote hain:

1. Sabhi rules aur regulationon ko samjhna.
2. Sabhi logon ko samjhaana ki rules aur regulation kya hain.
3. Sabhi logon ko samjhna ki rules aur regulation ke liye kya karana hoga.
4. Sabhi logon ko samjhna ki rules aur regulation ke liye kya nahin karana hoga.

**Applications:** General ke kaam mein sabhi fields shamil hain, jaise ki government, military, schools, colleges, aur industry. Unka kaam sabhi logon ko samjhne ke liye zaroori hota hai.

Sir, general samjhiye!

ðŸŽ¯ Definition: Ek general ek prakar ka file hota hai jo har kisi tarah ki file ko cover karta hai. Yeh file har type ke file ko store karta hai, jaise ki word, excel, pdf, aur anya.

ðŸ“š Real Example: Ek general ki tarah ek file folder bhi hota hai. Jab aap apne phone ya computer mein ek folder banate hain, toh aap usmein sabhi type ke file store kar sakte hain, jaise ki pictures, documents, aur videos.

ðŸ”¢ How it works: Jab aap ek file open karte hain, toh yeh general file us file ko identify karta hai aur use open karta hai. Yeh file aapke device ke operating system ke aadhar par kaam karta hai.

ðŸŒ Applications: General file har tarah ke operating system mein uplabdh hote hain, jaise ki Windows, macOS, aur Android. Yeh file aapko apne device par sabhi type ke file ko store aur open karne ka avsar pradan karta hai.

Sir, main aapko general ki baat karta hoon.

**Definition:** Ek general ek type ka aadhaarshila hai jo kisi vishay par aapko samjhaata hai. Yah aapko kisi vishay ke baare mein sahi jaankari pradan karta hai.

**Real Example:** Ek general jaise ki aapko kisi game ki rules samjhaane ke liye. Agar aapko cricket khelna hai, to aapko general samajhna hoga ki match kaise khelte hain, koi kya kar sakta hai, etc.

**How it works:** Ek general kaam karna yah hai kisi vishay ke baare mein aapko samjhaana. Iske liye aapko kisi vishay par research karna hoga, uske baare mein jaankari prapt karna hoga, aur tab aapko us vishay ke baare mein samjhana hoga.

**Applications:** General kisi bhi vishay par aapko samjhaata hai, jaise ki science, history, technology, sports, etc. Iske liye aapko kisi vishay ke baare mein aadhaarshila pradan karne ke liye general kaam karna hoga.

Sir, main aapko ummeed hai ki aapne general ki baat samjhi hogi.
